lead_paragraph: President Raúl Castro said Cuba was ready to exchange ambassadors once it was removed from Washington’s list of states sponsoring terrorism this month.

headline.print_headline: Cuba Ready to Exchange Diplomats, Raúl Castro Says
headline.main: Cuba Ready to Exchange Diplomats, Raúl Castro Says

snippet: President Raúl Castro said Cuba was ready to exchange ambassadors once it was removed from Washington’s list of states sponsoring terrorism this month.
abstract: Cuba's Pres Raul Castro says country is ready to exchange ambassadors with United States once it is formally removed from US government's list of states sponsoring terrorism.
